CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Christine?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Christine is arc {Jackfort}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Parkerside?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Parkerside is arc {Martinstad}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Jackfort to Christine in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Parkerside to Jackfort in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Christine and Jackfort in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Christine and Jackfort is {426}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Jackfort and Martinstad in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Jackfort and Martinstad is {194}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Parkerside?
SC.A: The total flow output from Parkerside is {447}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Ryanmouth?
SC.A: The total flow input by Ryanmouth is {327}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 397? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {426} from {Christine} to {Jackfort}, a flow of {423} from {Jackfort} to {Christine}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 210? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {194} from {Jackfort} to {Martinstad}, a flow of {173} from {Parkerside} to {Jackfort}, a flow of {135} from {Jackfort} to {Parkerside}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 210 and 318? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {310} from {Martinstad} to {Parkerside}, a flow of {274} from {Parkerside} to {Martinstad}, a flow of {227} from {Martinstad} to {Jackfort}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Jackfort to Parkerside or from Jackfort to Martinstad?
NC.A: The flow from {Jackfort} to {Martinstad} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Parkerside to Martinstad, from Christine to Jackfort, or from Ryanmouth to Jackfort?
NC.A: The flow from {Christine} to {Jackfort} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Martinstad}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Christine} and {Jackfort}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Ryanmouth, Arc Jackfort, Arc Christine, Arc Martinstad, Arc Parkerside}.
